column4: hey everyone, is there a way i can manipulate icon size on a system-wide basis? that is, set standard sizes for icons in nautilus and on the desktop?
is there a way i can manipulate icon size on a system-wide basis? that is, set standard sizes for icons in nautilus and on the desktop?
i think in nautilus you can set a default "zoom level"
Yeah, I saw that, but I guess what I really wanna do is shrink the standard size of my desktop icons
